Regarding search results from pathological studies, 603 items were found in PubMed on December 6, 2016. We reviewed abstracts of hit articles to narrow the search to those studies carried out under identical methods for quantitative or semi-quantitative analyses of MSA pathology in different patient cohorts. This review yielded only 2 studies that met the requirements, as follows. Ozawa et al. performed semi-quantitative assessments of neuronal cell loss at 24 anatomical sites in the OPC and SN regions (Fig. 1) in patients from the U.K.
